description:
A free messaging app for services like WhatsApp, Slack, Messenger and many more.


Features
- Update electron to 33.3.0
Bug Fixes
- App: Don't open multiple windows of the same type (5e3dbec)
- App: Fix "save image as" (db31dc3)
- App: Fix background colors (a28c1d9)
- App: Fix crash on logout (69ad832)
- App: Fix screen not being shared after selecting source (313ca03)
- App: Fix share screen selection styles (04a3d43)
- App: Improve image quality of window previews in share screen selection (30f445c)
- macOS: Open System Settings when asking for screen share permissions (4bf7af8)
- Screen Share: Fix missing background color (2627430)
- Service: Fix custom service icon upload (97c34d4)
- Todos: Add check if recipes have been loaded before downloading todos-recipe (76fea86)
- WebView: Set default background color to white (7fdf915)
